actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act and other provisions of law to delay for one year the effective dates of the supplemental Medicare premium and additional benefits under part B of the Medicare program, with the exception of the spousal impoverishment benefit.
short_title: Medicare Catastrophic Coverage Delay Act of 1990

summary.text: Medicare Catastrophic Coverage Delay Act of 1990 - Delays, for one year, the implementation of the Medicare Catastrophic Coverage Act of 1988, except for provisions of such Act expanding benefits under part A (Hospital Insurance) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: Medicare Catastrophic Coverage Delay Act of 1990

A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act and other provisions of law to delay for one year the effective dates of the supplemental Medicare premium and additional benefits under part B of the Medicare program, with the exception of the spousal impoverishment benefit.
